overview:
Oleg has been building software products for data management, engineering and manufacturing for the last 20 years. This is long time to gather experience in diverse fields — industry, customers, technology, organization, communication.

Currently Oleg is co-founder and CEO of Inforbix.

Prior to co-founding Inforbix, he has spent his last 11 years working for Smart Solutions, SmarTeam, Enovia, Dassault Systems. Over these years, he held various positions in R&D group and company management. Most recently he was ENOVIA SmarTeam Chief Technology Officer. Back in 2008, he established his first blog — Daily PLM Think Tank on plmtwine.com.

Prior to that he spent few years developing data management and CRM applications at Decision Systems Israel. Before, he was working for Autodesk reseller in Israel, focusing on application development, customer implementations, pre-sale and training.

He holds a PhD in CAD Systems from the Moscow Civil Engineering Institute and a MSc in Computer Systems for Industries a Polytechnic Institute in Russia.

relationships.title: Sr. Director PLM and Data Management

milestones.description: Joined Autodesk as Sr. Director of PLM and Data Management
